fortunately Amazon Sage Maker offers an

separate modules build train and deploy

first the bill sage maker makes it easy

framework for your application
Amazon Sage Maker includes hosted
Jupiter notebooks that make it easy to

stored in Amazon s3 you can then connect

secure and scalable manner to help you
select your algorithm Sage Maker
includes 13 the most common machine

Amazon sage maker also comes
pre-configured with high-level api's to

the most popular open source frameworks
or you can bring your own framework as a
custom container for use in sage maker
next we have sage maker training you can

for python allowing for automation of
your machine learning pipeline the
service manages all the underlying
infrastructure and can easily scale to

Amazon Sage Maker offers hyper parameter

once your model is trained in tuned sage
maker makes it easy to deploy your model

with training you can execute deployment

cluster of Amazon ec2 instances that are
